title: Milk chocolate cake
ingredients: ['For chocolate cake', '200g (7 oz) self-raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '225g (8 oz) caster sugar', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '110g (4 oz) butter', '2 eggs, beaten', '5 tablespoons milk', '5 tablespoons water', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', 'For filling and icing', '60g (2.5 oz) butter, melted', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '225g (8 oz) icing sugar', '3 tablespoons hot milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence']
